item.description:
Hi Snowboarders/Skiiers,

how about a meet up at John Harvards Pub in Harvard sq.

pls rsvp look like it will be craxy mobbed, , they said we can have a big round table that sits t up to 25, if there are more people than that hmm i have no idea what will happen

John Harvard's Brew House
33 Dunster Street
Cambridge, MA 02138
Phone (617) 868-3585
Phone: (617) 868-3585
item.name: The Somerville Snowboarding NOV Meetup ~!~
